title: Stara Obra
content:
Stara Obra [ˈstara ˈɔbra] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Koźmin Wielkopolski, within Krotoszyn County, Greater Poland Voivodeship, in west-central Poland.[1] It lies approximately 7 kilometres (4 mi) north of Koźmin Wielkopolski, 23 km (14 mi) north of Krotoszyn, and 68 km (42 mi) south-east of the regional capital Poznań.

This Krotoszyn County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
